title: Lucy Mecklenburgh displays her blossoming baby bump as she soaks up the sun in Portugal
text:
She recently revealed the happy news that she and fiancé Ryan Thomas are expecting a baby boy.

And Lucy Mecklenburgh looked nothing short of sensational as she displayed her blossoming baby bump while soaking up the sun in Portugal.

The former TOWIE star, 28, shared a snap of herself wearing a bright red bikini while relaxing on the beach in the Algarve.

Stunning: Lucy Mecklenburgh looked nothing short of sensational as she displayed her blossoming baby bump while soaking up the sun in Portugal

Showing off her sun-kissed glow in the snap, Lucy also sported a pair of shades and wore her brunette locks in an updo.

Alongside the snap, she wrote: 'Dear body. You are incredible!'

In another shot, Lucy made her social media followers envious as she posed in front of a large pool with several palm trees visible in the background.

She donned an orange swimsuit with a white dot print which she paired with a white lace shawl.

Style: In another shot, Lucy donned an orange swimsuit with a white dot print which she paired with a white lace shawl

It comes after Lucy shared a sweet video of the moment she and Ryan discovered the sex of the baby as she looked overjoyed at the news.

Ryan, meanwhile, made the announcement with a photo of himself and Lucy, clad in blue swimwear, cradling her bump. He wrote: 'Blue is for.....?'

In the video Lucy shared on Instagram, Ryan was reduced to tears when he discovered they were having a baby boy.

Lucy, who clutched the papers revealing their baby's sex in her hands, brought her hand to her mouth in shock when she gazed down at the paper.

Family: It comes after Lucy shared a sweet video of the moment she and Ryan discovered the sex of the baby as she looked overjoyed at the news

Announcement: Ryan, meanwhile, made the announcement with a photo of himself and Lucy, clad in blue swimwear, cradling her bump. He wrote: 'Blue is for.....?'

Overwhelmed with joy, Ryan punched his hands in the air, hugged Lucy and gave her a kiss on the cheek.

Within minutes of revealing the gender, a slew of their celebrity pals rushed to congratulate them. Samia Longchambon wrote: 'Aww a little boy! Congrats guys.'

Dean Gaffney joked: 'As much as we take the p**s out of each other, your photo skills are on point.' Ashley James commented with a slew of love heart emojis.

Lucy took to Instagram on the evening of her 28th birthday to announce she is expecting her first child with Ryan and debuted her blossoming baby bump in a figure-hugging red dress.
